wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Marsh (4 May 1947 – 31 March 2020) was an English footballer who made 186 appearances in the Football League playing as a central defender for Bolton Wanderers, Rochdale and Darlington.On 1 April 2020, his former club Bolton Wanderers announced that he had died at the age of 72.
